articles.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today

articles.title: Bitcoin on Exchanges Can Be Legally Seized in South Korea, Supreme Court Affirms
articles.description: The South Korean Supreme Court confirmed that Bitcoin stored on crypto exchanges can be seized under criminal law, rejecting an appeal.
